summary: REQ-13 appears to be implemented via updates to CaseCard to render Presenting Complaint in a visually distinct blue bordered/filled section with light/dark theme classes. However, the diff is truncated, so some acceptance criteria (e.g., unchanged label text) cannot be fully verified from the provided excerpts. Several additional changes (checklist persistence/search and task badge styling) appear to have been made beyond the requested UI emphasis update.

missing_requirements.requirement: No user-facing text labels are changed; the label remains “Presenting Complaint”.
missing_requirements.reason: The CaseCard.tsx diff is truncated before the Presenting Complaint section, so the exact label text used in the updated UI cannot be confirmed from the excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed create-case flow to pass/save checklist state (mutations updated to accept/pass checklist).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to visually emphasize the Presenting Complaint field on the case card; it explicitly states non-goals around checklist defaults/semantics and does not request checklist persistence changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: 'useCreateCase now accepts and passes checklist parameter to backend.')
frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/features/cases/components/CaseFormDialog.tsx: 'now passes checklist state to createCase mutation on new case creation.')
frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/features/cases/components/CsvImportExportPanel.tsx: 'now properly passes complete case data including checklist directly to createCase mutation.')

hallucinated_features.description: Updated search behavior related to checklist items (matching checked/true items).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-13 and outside the scope of emphasizing Presenting Complaint on the case card UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: 'updated to match cases where searched checklist items are checked (true).')

hallucinated_features.description: Adjusted remaining checklist item badge styling (e.g., special styling for Histo/Imaging).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-13; requirement is specifically about Presenting Complaint visual emphasis on the CaseCard.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/features/cases/components/CaseCard.tsx: 'remaining checklist items as task badges with purple styling for Histo and blue styling for Imaging')
